title: Carnival CEO Discusses Mandated Vaccines
itunes:title: Carnival CEO Discusses Mandated Vaccines
description:
Carnival Corp. CEO Arnold Donald discusses whether vaccines should be mandated for his ship’s crews and passengers.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
